Sentencas: Overseas hydrogen transport via ships is crucial to meet the global energy supply as we shift from the carbon-based fuel era.
Titulo: Large-scale overseas transportation of hydrogen: Comparative techno-economic and environmental investigation

Sentencas: In this study, the hydrogen supply chain, which includes chemical and physical storage processes as well as sea and land transport and terminals, was economically and environmentally investigated.
Titulo: Large-scale overseas transportation of hydrogen: Comparative techno-economic and environmental investigation

Sentencas: Five different storage technologies (i.e., liquid hydrogen, ammonia, toluene-methylcyclohexane [TOL-MCH], dibenzyltoluene-perhydro-dibenzyltoluene (H0DBT-H18DBT), and methanol) were applied to a defined intercontinental hydrogen supply chain that carries 300,000 t of hydrogen per year via ships.
Titulo: Large-scale overseas transportation of hydrogen: Comparative techno-economic and environmental investigation

Sentencas: The five hydrogen storage technologies were evaluated and compared based on their economic and environmental performance.
Titulo: Large-scale overseas transportation of hydrogen: Comparative techno-economic and environmental investigation

Sentencas: To achieve a higher energy efficiency, the models were upgraded by integrating liquid natural gas (LNG) to achieve hydrogen liquefaction and utilizing the waste heat of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Large-scale overseas transportation of hydrogen: Comparative techno-economic and environmental investigation

Sentencas: Additionally, assuming that renewable energy capacity will be dominant in the future, renewable electricity and green hydrogen usage were investigated.
Titulo: Large-scale overseas transportation of hydrogen: Comparative techno-economic and environmental investigation

Sentencas: The results showed that the TOL-MCH supply chain is the most cost-effective and environmentally friendly technology with 5.8 $/kgH(2)
Titulo: Large-scale overseas transportation of hydrogen: Comparative techno-economic and environmental investigation

Sentencas: levelized cost and 18.5 kgCO(2)-eq/kgH(2) carbon intensity, followed by the ammonia supply chain, due to its suitable operating conditions.
Titulo: Large-scale overseas transportation of hydrogen: Comparative techno-economic and environmental investigation

Sentencas: In the case of renewable electricity and green hydrogen dominance, the ammonia supply chain generates the lowest carbon emissions (i.e., 2.23 kgCO(2)-eq/kgH(2)) with a cost of 4.92 $/kgH(2), and the TOL-MCH chain is the most cost-effective technology (i.e., 4.57 $/kgH(2)).
Titulo: Large-scale overseas transportation of hydrogen: Comparative techno-economic and environmental investigation

Sentencas: Therefore, a decrease in process energy consumption and the use of renewable energy sources are essential for efficient and sustainable hydrogen seaborne transport.
Titulo: Large-scale overseas transportation of hydrogen: Comparative techno-economic and environmental investigation
